data.title: The Fall of Hyperion
data.meta_description: New York: Doubleday, 1990. First Edition. Hardcover. 517 pages. The sequel to Simmon's Hugo Award-winning Hyperion. Very good / Fine. Item No: #306607 First edition first printing . Some spotting to page edges, else fine in a near fine dust jacket with a small stain on the back flap. Inscribed on the title page, For Tom Garner, with warmest regards. Dan
data.text:
Simmons, Dan

Notes: 517 pages.

The sequel to Simmon's Hugo Award-winning Hyperion.

Edition + Condition: First edition (first printing). Some spotting to page edges, else fine in a near fine dust jacket with a small stain on the back flap. Inscribed on the title page, "For Tom Garner, with warmest regards. Dan Simmons." With the errata page 305 laid in (this page was omitted in the printed book).

Publication: New York: Doubleday, 1990.

ISBN: 9780747203445

Item No: #306607

Sold
